content.question: What is the significance of Cynthia and Stan’s discussion of a Panama Canal cruise at the beginning of the scene?

choices.label: It reveals Cynthia’s plan to take a birthday cruise with her friends.
It suggests Cynthia’s desire to escape a stressful situation.
It establishes the oppressive heat of the setting.
It demonstrates the financial benefits of Cynthia’s new job.

content.answer: It suggests Cynthia’s desire to escape a stressful situation.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
